title: Okay, what is going on? Getting absolute muppets on my team.
body:
Third-last game:
Lee Sin: 0.29 KDA
Jhin: 0.60 KDA
Malzahar: 0.67 KDA
Teemo: 0.57 KDA

Second-last game:
Mundo: 0.67 KDA
Diana: 0.63 KDA
Rest barely above 1.0

Last game:
Alistar: 0.90 KDA
Ezreal: 1.11 KDA

What in the fuck? What is happening here?

replies.body: Happens to a lot of people , if you can't take it take a break and come back another time. Not saying its your fault but people nowadays are just slack and not motivated

playing 3 games where your team doesn't preform is normal lol. everyone has those days i dont know why your upset about it
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Come on. As if you've had a game where your entire team goes under 1.0 KDA.
Most people will have at some point. You think you're the only one who gets bad teams?
He's probably upset because he has a team that under performs, like you just said

yeah literallly 10 matches in a row tilted, 3 remakes and an hour more of false starts finding a match, the community on here is vast and mostly muppets, only here to rage and say thier bit. aparently matchmaking with friends is the ONLY way to play this game satisfyingly




welldone riot, thanks for all the bots and the WORST matchmaking service i've ever seen across all the games i know of.
seriously, how bad does your server have to be when it takes more than 2 hours to find a functional game .... "slow claps"
